description: Divisible only by primes congruent to 3 mod 7.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..1000] | forall{d: d in PrimeDivisors(n) | d mod 7 eq 3}]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 20 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Offset changed from 0 to 1 by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 20 2012
